function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Data collected from a specific group may not be representative of the overall population of Kuwait, leading to biased conclusions.","Impact":"Inaccurate conclusions about activity patterns and household characteristics of the Kuwaiti population.","Mitigation":"Use additional data sources to supplement and validate the findings from the student sample.","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools for validating data representativeness.","People":"General population of Kuwait.","Owner":"Research institutions, statistical agencies."},{"Description":"Potential privacy concerns and ethical implications due to the private nature of the data collected.","Impact":"Risk of breaching the privacy and confidentiality of individuals' personal matters and residences.","Mitigation":"Ensure strict data protection protocols, obtain informed consent, and anonymize any identifiable information.","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure storage systems, and anonymization techniques.","People":"Participants whose personal data is collected.","Owner":"Research institutions, ethics review boards."},{"Description":"Risk of propagation of contagious diseases during the data collection process, especially with the involvement of multiple households.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases among the students, researchers, and the households visited.","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, provide personal protective equipment, and adhere to public health guidelines for data collection activities.","Technologies":"Health monitoring tools, contact tracing applications, and remote data collection methods.","People":"Students, researchers, household members.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health authorities."}]}
